backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing phone-number related updates and affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend React components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the React app root and favicon with meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all site sections plus header, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/con: Component rendering all configured phone numbers as tel links with optional icon and separator.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/cta: CTA button linking to the primary configured phone number for call actions.
Button component linking to the configured WhatsApp URL with primary and outline variants.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Floating WhatsApp button linking to the configured WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer showing company info, social links, quick navigation, and phone numbers from config.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky header with smooth-scroll navigation, mobile menu, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: Renders an about section describing the company, its mission, vision, and values in styled cards.
Displays a gallery of construction photos using a grid of hover-animated image cards.
Provides company contact info and a form that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message on submit.
Hero section with main heading, CTAs, scroll-to-section buttons, and a feature list card.
Shows four highlight cards summarizing key strengths such as quality and on‑time delivery.
Outlines the company’s six‑step workflow in a grid of numbered cards.
Displays a portfolio grid of project images with titles and locations.
Lists the company’s service offerings with icons, titles, and short descriptions.
Lists reasons to choose the company using icon cards on a navy gradient background.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Top bar displaying phone numbers, WhatsApp link, email, and address.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports centralized contact details including phones, WhatsApp info, email, and address.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines social link types and a list of platform URLs, plus a helper that filters links with valid URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, component classes, and utilities for the app’s design system.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp message URLs using the central contact config.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and project structure state.
